nodes.text: Vazaveer was a divination and fortune-telling game that could also be used in gambling. It was played using three Vazaveer fichas, the Malcontent, Neuronaught, and Octopent. The Vazaveer fichas were made up from parts of Fyzen Gor's Original Dozen, and members of his Brotherhood of Wire and Bone, including Seven-Seven Dirgeos, often played the game.
